credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Half Teacup
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: In the shape of a cup sliced in half through the middle, with applied flat solid square handle; both round side and flat side of cup painted with Suprematist decorations composed of black and reddish-brown geometric shapes floating on white background.
name: Cup
